title: A Plague Tale Requiem 4K Gameplay - First 30 Minutes In Ultra Graphics (PC 4K 60FPS)

media:group.media:title: A Plague Tale Requiem 4K Gameplay - First 30 Minutes In Ultra Graphics (PC 4K 60FPS)
media:group.media:description:
A Plague Tale Requiem PC Gameplay | A Plague Tale Requiem 4K Gameplay | A Plague Tale Requiem PC Walkthrough | PC 4K 60FPS |

A Plague Tale: Requiem is an upcoming action-adventure stealth video game developed by Asobo Studio and published by Focus Entertainment. It is the sequel to A Plague Tale: Innocence, and follows siblings Amicia and Hugo de Rune who must look for a cure to Hugo's blood disease in Southern France while fleeing from soldiers of the Inquisition and hordes of rats that are spreading the black plague. The game is set to be released for Windows, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X and Series S in October 2022.
